mutants.code:
def min_changes_to_anagram(s: str) -> int:
    l = len(s)
    if l % 2 == 0:
        return -1
    half = l // 2
    a = s[:half]
    b = s[half:]
    from collections import Counter
    count_a = Counter(a)
    count_b = Counter(b)
    changes = 0
    for char in count_a:
        if count_a[char] > count_b.get(char, 0):
            changes += count_a[char] - count_b.get(char, 0)
    return changes

def min_changes_to_anagram(s: str) -> int:
    l = len(s)
    if l % 2 != 0:
        return -1
    half = l / 2
    a = s[:half]

    count_a = Counter(a)

    changes = 0
    for char in count_a:
        if count_a[char] > count_b.get(char, 0):
            changes += count_a[char] - count_b.get(char, 0)
    return changes
